import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import "./App.css"; import "./bootstrap.min.css"; class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { products: [], count: [], countAvailability: [], countUser: [] }; } componentDidMount() { axios .get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/products`, { mode: "no-cors", headers: { "Access-Control-Allow-Origin": "*", "Content-Type": "application/json" } }) .then(res => { const data = res.data; this.setState({ products: data.produits }); this.setState({ count: data.count }); this.setState({ countAvailability: data.countAvailability }); this.setState({ countUser: data.countUser }); }); } handleLogout() { localStorage.removeItem('token') } render() { const { products } = this.state; const { count } = this.state; const { countAvailability } = this.state; const { countUser } = this.state; let button; let buttonR; if (JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("token")) !== null) { button = this.handleLogout()}> Déconnexion; } else { button = ( Connexion); buttonR = ( Inscription); } return (
E-COMMERCE
Accueil {button}{buttonR}
Produits totals
{count}
Produits dispos
{countAvailability}
Produits vendus
20,452
Utilisateurs inscrits
{countUser}
{products.map(product => (
{product.title}

{product.description}

Prix: {product.price} €

Ajouté le: {product.created_at}

En savoir plus

))}
); } } export default App;
